decimalPlaces) {\n  \n  var num = Number(value);\n  if (isNaN(num)) {\n    return num;  \/\/ Return as is if it's not a valid number\n  }\n  \n  var factor = Math.pow(10, decimalPlaces);\n  var valueToRound = num * factor;\n  var roundedValue = (valueToRound % 1 == 0.5 || valueToRound % 1 == -0.5) ? \n    (valueToRound > 0 ? Math.floor(valueToRound) + 1 : Math.ceil(valueToRound) - 1) : \n    Math.round(valueToRound);\n  \n  return roundedValue \/ factor;\n}","index":2,"text":"def roundAwayFromZero ="}},{"result":{"nanos":643174700,"startTime":1733387011645,"endTime":1733387012288,"millis":643.1747,"status":"passed"},"step":{"line":30,"prefix":"*","index":3,"text":"def postResponse = karate.call('classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature')"},"callResults":[{"failedCount":0,"prefixedPath":"classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature","packageQualifiedName":"drivetecTestCases.features.CreatePositions","loopIndex":-1,"relativePath":"drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature","scenarioResults":[{"sectionIndex":0,"stepResults":[{"result":{"nanos":116700,"startTime":1733387011649,"endTime":1733387011649,"millis":0.1167,"status":"passed"},"step":{"comments":["# This runs before each scenario and generates the ProjectId once"],"background":true,"line":8,"prefix":"*","index":0,"text":"def projectId = karate.callSingle('classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreateProject.feature')"}},{"result":{"nanos":1100400,"startTime":1733387011649,"endTime":1733387011650,"millis":1.1004,"status":"passed"},"step":{"background":true,"line":9,"prefix":"*","index":1,"text":"karate.log('Using ProjectId: ', projectId)"},"stepLog":"13:53:31.649 Using ProjectId:  {\n  \"result\": {\n    \"projectId\": \"prjId\"\n  },\n  \"projectPayload\": {\n    \"Id\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\",\n    \"Name\": \"AUT_TPJ33518\",\n    \"Address\": \"Hyderabad, Telangana, India\",\n    \"Description\": \"\",\n    \"CreatedBy\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\",\n    \"ModifiedBy\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\"\n  },\n  \"uniqueName\": \"AUT_TPJ33518\",\n  \"responseHeaders\": {\n    \"Content-Type\": [\n      \"application\/json; decimalPlaces) {\n  \n  var num = Number(value);\n  if (isNaN(num)) {\n    return num;  \/\/ Return as is if it's not a valid number\n  }\n  \n  var factor = Math.pow(10, decimalPlaces);\n  var valueToRound = num * factor;\n  var roundedValue = (valueToRound % 1 == 0.5 || valueToRound % 1 == -0.5) ? \n    (valueToRound > 0 ? Math.floor(valueToRound) + 1 : Math.ceil(valueToRound) - 1) : \n    Math.round(valueToRound);\n  \n  return roundedValue \/ factor;\n}","index":2,"text":"def roundAwayFromZero ="}},{"result":{"nanos":2003376700,"startTime":1733387053001,"endTime":1733387055004,"millis":2003.3767,"status":"passed"},"step":{"line":30,"prefix":"*","index":3,"text":"def postResponse = karate.call('classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature')"},"callResults":[{"failedCount":0,"prefixedPath":"classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature","packageQualifiedName":"drivetecTestCases.features.CreatePositions","loopIndex":-1,"relativePath":"drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature","scenarioResults":[{"sectionIndex":0,"stepResults":[{"result":{"nanos":140300,"startTime":1733387053005,"endTime":1733387053005,"millis":0.1403,"status":"passed"},"step":{"comments":["# This runs before each scenario and generates the ProjectId once"],"background":true,"line":8,"prefix":"*","index":0,"text":"def projectId = karate.callSingle('classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreateProject.feature')"}},{"result":{"nanos":188700,"startTime":1733387053005,"endTime":1733387053005,"millis":0.1887,"status":"passed"},"step":{"background":true,"line":9,"prefix":"*","index":1,"text":"karate.log('Using ProjectId: ', projectId)"},"stepLog":"13:54:13.005 Using ProjectId:  {\n  \"result\": {\n    \"projectId\": \"prjId\"\n  },\n  \"projectPayload\": {\n    \"Id\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\",\n    \"Name\": \"AUT_TPJ33518\",\n    \"Address\": \"Hyderabad, Telangana, India\",\n    \"Description\": \"\",\n    \"CreatedBy\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\",\n    \"ModifiedBy\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\"\n  },\n  \"uniqueName\": \"AUT_TPJ33518\",\n  \"responseHeaders\": {\n    \"Content-Type\": [\n      \"application\/json; decimalPlaces) {\n  \n  var num = Number(value);\n  if (isNaN(num)) {\n    return num;  \/\/ Return as is if it's not a valid number\n  }\n  \n  var factor = Math.pow(10, decimalPlaces);\n  var valueToRound = num * factor;\n  var roundedValue = (valueToRound % 1 == 0.5 || valueToRound % 1 == -0.5) ? \n    (valueToRound > 0 ? Math.floor(valueToRound) + 1 : Math.ceil(valueToRound) - 1) : \n    Math.round(valueToRound);\n  \n  return roundedValue \/ factor;\n}","index":2,"text":"def roundAwayFromZero ="}},{"result":{"nanos":664367500,"startTime":1733387071738,"endTime":1733387072402,"millis":664.3675,"status":"passed"},"step":{"line":30,"prefix":"*","index":3,"text":"def postResponse = karate.call('classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature')"},"callResults":[{"failedCount":0,"prefixedPath":"classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature","packageQualifiedName":"drivetecTestCases.features.CreatePositions","loopIndex":-1,"relativePath":"drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature","scenarioResults":[{"sectionIndex":0,"stepResults":[{"result":{"nanos":121300,"startTime":1733387071742,"endTime":1733387071742,"millis":0.1213,"status":"passed"},"step":{"comments":["# This runs before each scenario and generates the ProjectId once"],"background":true,"line":8,"prefix":"*","index":0,"text":"def projectId = karate.callSingle('classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreateProject.feature')"}},{"result":{"nanos":166500,"startTime":1733387071742,"endTime":1733387071742,"millis":0.1665,"status":"passed"},"step":{"background":true,"line":9,"prefix":"*","index":1,"text":"karate.log('Using ProjectId: ', projectId)"},"stepLog":"13:54:31.742 Using ProjectId:  {\n  \"result\": {\n    \"projectId\": \"prjId\"\n  },\n  \"projectPayload\": {\n    \"Id\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\",\n    \"Name\": \"AUT_TPJ33518\",\n    \"Address\": \"Hyderabad, Telangana, India\",\n    \"Description\": \"\",\n    \"CreatedBy\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\",\n    \"ModifiedBy\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\"\n  },\n  \"uniqueName\": \"AUT_TPJ33518\",\n  \"responseHeaders\": {\n    \"Content-Type\": [\n      \"application\/json; Math.floor(valueToRound) + 1 : Math.ceil(valueToRound) - 1) : \n    Math.round(valueToRound);\n  \n  return roundedValue \/ factor;\n}","index":2,"text":"def roundAwayFromZero ="}},{"result":{"nanos":660381200,"startTime":1733387075416,"endTime":1733387076076,"millis":660.3812,"status":"passed"},"step":{"line":30,"prefix":"*","index":3,"text":"def postResponse = karate.call('classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature')"},"callResults":[{"failedCount":0,"prefixedPath":"classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature","packageQualifiedName":"drivetecTestCases.features.CreatePositions","loopIndex":-1,"relativePath":"drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature","scenarioResults":[{"sectionIndex":0,"stepResults":[{"result":{"nanos":172600,"startTime":1733387075419,"endTime":1733387075419,"millis":0.1726,"status":"passed"},"step":{"comments":["# This runs before each scenario and generates the ProjectId once"],"background":true,"line":8,"prefix":"*","index":0,"text":"def projectId = karate.callSingle('classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreateProject.feature')"}},{"result":{"nanos":434300,"startTime":1733387075419,"endTime":1733387075419,"millis":0.4343,"status":"passed"},"step":{"background":true,"line":9,"prefix":"*","index":1,"text":"karate.log('Using ProjectId: ', projectId)"},"stepLog":"13:54:35.420 Using ProjectId:  {\n  \"result\": {\n    \"projectId\": \"prjId\"\n  },\n  \"projectPayload\": {\n    \"Id\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\",\n    \"Name\": \"AUT_TPJ33518\",\n    \"Address\": \"Hyderabad, Telangana, India\",\n    \"Description\": \"\",\n    \"CreatedBy\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\",\n    \"ModifiedBy\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\"\n  },\n  \"uniqueName\": \"AUT_TPJ33518\",\n  \"responseHeaders\": {\n    \"Content-Type\": [\n      \"application\/json; decimalPlaces) {\n  \n  var num = Number(value);\n  if (isNaN(num)) {\n    return num;  \/\/ Return as is if it's not a valid number\n  }\n  \n  var factor = Math.pow(10, decimalPlaces);\n  var Math.floor(valueToRound) + 1 : Math.ceil(valueToRound) - 1) : \n    Math.round(valueToRound);\n  \n  return roundedValue \/ factor;\n}","index":2,"text":"def roundAwayFromZero ="}},{"result":{"nanos":666064900,"startTime":1733387094139,"endTime":1733387094805,"millis":666.0649,"status":"passed"},"step":{"line":30,"prefix":"*","index":3,"text":"def postResponse = karate.call('classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature')"},"callResults":[{"failedCount":0,"prefixedPath":"classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature","packageQualifiedName":"drivetecTestCases.features.CreatePositions","loopIndex":-1,"relativePath":"drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreatePositions.feature","scenarioResults":[{"sectionIndex":0,"stepResults":[{"result":{"nanos":140400,"startTime":1733387094142,"endTime":1733387094142,"millis":0.1404,"status":"passed"},"step":{"comments":["# This runs before each scenario and generates the ProjectId once"],"background":true,"line":8,"prefix":"*","index":0,"text":"def projectId = karate.callSingle('classpath:drivetecTestCases\/features\/CreateProject.feature')"}},{"result":{"nanos":192900,"startTime":1733387094142,"endTime":1733387094142,"millis":0.1929,"status":"passed"},"step":{"background":true,"line":9,"prefix":"*","index":1,"text":"karate.log('Using ProjectId: ', projectId)"},"stepLog":"13:54:54.142 Using ProjectId:  {\n  \"result\": {\n    \"projectId\": \"prjId\"\n  },\n  \"projectPayload\": {\n    \"Id\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\",\n    \"Name\": \"AUT_TPJ33518\",\n    \"Address\": \"Hyderabad, Telangana, India\",\n    \"Description\": \"\",\n    \"CreatedBy\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\",\n    \"ModifiedBy\": \"579816e4-6653-4794-b435-a885f32e28d7\"\n  },\n  \"uniqueName\": \"AUT_TPJ33518\",\n  \"responseHeaders\": {\n    \"Content-Type\": [\n      \"application\/json;
